name: Spiritwalker
description: More than man, spiritwalkers are vessels for the untamed spirits of the wild. Most spiritwalkers are able to tap into the powers of the spirits with relative safety, but some lose themselves and surrender to the wild completely.

name: Tiger-possessed Spiritwalker
description: A spiritwalker that has, willingly or not, given in to the ferocious nature of the tiger spirit.

name: Turtle-posssessed Spiritwalker
description: A spiritwalker that has, willingly or not, given in to the unyielding nature of the turtle spirit.

name: Bear-possessed Spiritwalker
description: A spiritwalker that has, willingly or not, given in to the unstoppable nature of the bear spirit.

name: Phoenix-possessed Spiritwalker
description: A spiritwalker that has, willingly or not, given in to the eternal nature of the phoenix spirit.

name: Dragon-possessed Spiritwalker
description: A poor or foolish spiritwalker that has, willingly or not, given in to the godly nature of the dragon spirit. Destruction incarnate, Dragon spiritwalkers tend to have very short lifespans.
